video.title: Cable Girls
video.synopsis: In 1920s Madrid, four women at the National Telephone Company ring in revolution as they manage romance, friendship and the modern workplace.

episodes.synopsis: Lidia is used to being a thief, but now she must steal in order to save her life. Different hopes propel each of the women into the workplace.
episodes.title: Chapter 1: Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Francisco offers Lidia a deal. Marga worries about what she saw at the party. Carlota's father interferes with her life.
episodes.title: Chapter 2: Memories

episodes.synopsis: The police are called in when Lidia's identity is questioned. Francisco's wife is suspicious and asks Carolina for help.
episodes.title: Chapter 3: Lies

episodes.synopsis: Marga makes a lunch date with Pablo. Ángeles learns more about Mario's infidelity. Carlota's fantasies surprise her.
episodes.title: Chapter 4: Feelings

episodes.synopsis: Carolina threatens to reveal who Lidia really is. Miguel tells Carlota she must decide about their relationship. Everything changes for Ángeles.
episodes.title: Chapter 5: The Past

episodes.synopsis: Lidia helps Ángeles plan her escape. Carlota works to get Sara released from jail. Carlos fights with his father.
episodes.title: Chapter 6: Family

episodes.synopsis: The Cifuentes family mourns their loss. Lidia decides she should be honest with Carlos about her identity.
episodes.title: Chapter 7: Loss

episodes.synopsis: The new rotary technology divides Lidia's loyalties, and she is forced to choose between Carlos and her friends.
episodes.title: Chapter 8: Love

episodes.synopsis: As 1928 turns into 1929, Lidia reports to a new boss, Carlota is blackmailed, Marga gets a hidden surprise, and all three rush to Ángeles's rescue.
episodes.title: Chapter 9: The Choice

episodes.synopsis: Lidia directs a cover-up plan, but a theft complicates things and Marga is later caught in a lie. Carlos and Francisco negotiate an alliance.
episodes.title: Chapter 10: Pact

episodes.synopsis: Marisol tries to drive Marga and Pablo apart. Carlota becomes suspicious of Sara. Lidia notices a crucial difference between Carlos and Francisco.
episodes.title: Chapter 11: Jealousy

episodes.synopsis: Sara reveals a secret to Carlota. Ángeles learns Inspector Cuevas's weakness. Pablo shows Marga his undying love. Lidia helps end an operator strike.
episodes.title: Chapter 12: Guilt

episodes.synopsis: Sara seeks medical advice. Lidia gets news that complicates her choice between Francisco and Carlos. Marga learns Pablo is hiding a delicate problem.
episodes.title: Chapter 13: Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Lidia gets a tempting offer. Carlota and her friends respond to a plea for help. Ángeles takes a risky step in order to learn the witness's identity.
episodes.title: Chapter 14: Loneliness

episodes.synopsis: The police find a body. Ángeles learns who's been spooking her. Francisco gives Lidia space, while Carlos gives her a surprise. An arrest is made.
episodes.title: Chapter 15: Opportunities

episodes.synopsis: Carlota gets news about Miguel. Guilt-stricken Marga goes into seclusion. Lidia learns Francisco has made a decision. Ángeles finds herself cornered.
episodes.title: Chapter 16: Innocence

episodes.synopsis: Six months later, a catastrophic event deeply affects Lidia, Marga, Carlota, Ángeles and their loved ones. Marga gets a surprise visit from an in-law.
episodes.title: Chapter 17: Time

episodes.synopsis: With her friends' help, Lidia puts her plan into action. Carlota decides what to do with her inheritance. Ángeles tries to earn Pedro Guzmán's trust.
episodes.title: Chapter 18: Death

episodes.synopsis: Lidia's desperation worries Carlos and spurs Francisco to offer support. Marga helps Julio cover Pablo's job. Carlota finds a way to promote her cause.
episodes.title: Chapter 19: Truth

episodes.synopsis: Lidia and Francisco visit an orphanage to gather info. Complications arise with Marga when Julio impersonates housebound Pablo, who sneaks back to work.
episodes.title: Chapter 20: Revenge

episodes.synopsis: Ángeles must deflect Guzmán's suspicion of a mole. Carlos learns his mother's car was sabotaged and confronts Lidia. Marga has a horrible realization.
episodes.title: Chapter 21: Sin

episodes.synopsis: To protect her child, Ángeles accepts a deal with Guzmán. A phone call gives Lidia a hunch on Eva's whereabouts. Carlota responds to her attackers.
episodes.title: Chapter 22: Fight

episodes.synopsis: Lidia turns the tables on her captor. During the king's visit, those fighting for Carlota's cause take drastic measures, forcing her to choose sides.
episodes.title: Chapter 23: Hope

episodes.synopsis: As the situation escalates, Lidia tries to get to Eva, Marga shocks Pablo, Carlota takes a risk, Ángeles learns a truth and Francisco attempts a rescue.
episodes.title: Chapter 24: Destiny

episodes.synopsis: Carlota's new political career faces a major obstacle as Marga suffers heartbreak. Meanwhile, Lidia returns to work and Ángeles pitches an idea to her.
episodes.title: Chapter 25: Equality

episodes.synopsis: As her memory starts to slowly come back, Carlota's friends try to clear her name. Ángeles begins teaching classes. Lidia's former enemy returns.
episodes.title: Chapter 26: Liberty

episodes.synopsis: Lidia and Carlos argue over a loved one's medical treatment. Óscar makes a shocking discovery about Dulce. Marga gets to know her boss better.
episodes.title: Chapter 27: Justice

episodes.synopsis: With Carlota's future looking perilous, Óscar starts falsifying evidence to get her out of prison. A different doctor gives Lidia new hope.
episodes.title: Chapter 28: Fear

episodes.synopsis: The friends begin concocting a plan to free Óscar from prison and Marga turns to Pablo for assistance. Carlos is surprised by his friend's condition.
episodes.title: Chapter 29: Life

episodes.synopsis: Carmen creates a deception while Carlos continues to keep Lidia in the dark. Carlota tries desperately to escape from her captor.
episodes.title: Chapter 30: Doubt

episodes.synopsis: Lidia is confused and hurt by Carlos's betrayal. An unlikely ally is enlisted to try to free Óscar. Carmen's calculating plan starts falling into place.
episodes.title: Chapter 31: Happiness

episodes.synopsis: When the prison break is set in motion, the team faces unforeseen consequences. Lidia makes a heartbreaking decision in order to protect Eva.
episodes.title: Chapter 32: Luck

episodes.synopsis: Lidia leaves New York and returns to Madrid in search of Sofía, who has run away to join the Republicans in the Spanish Civil War.
episodes.title: Chapter 33: War

episodes.synopsis: Lidia's friends — both old and new — help her attempt to force Carlos to call Sofía back from the front lines. Pablo looks for ways to avoid enlisting.
episodes.title: Chapter 34: Hate

episodes.synopsis: Óscar and Carlota risk their journalistic integrity in exchange for helping Lidia with Sofía. Marga falls ill while running a dangerous errand.
episodes.title: Chapter 35: Courage

episodes.synopsis: Carlos and Lidia encounter trouble in their search for Sofía. Carlota visits the western front with James, to Óscar's chagrin. Pablo goes missing.
episodes.title: Chapter 36: Control

episodes.synopsis: When Madrid falls to the Nationalists, Lidia and most of her friends must face widespread grief and devastation, with long-term consequences.
episodes.title: Chapter 37: Insanity

episodes.synopsis: Lidia's defiance gets her into trouble at the prison camp, while Francisco concocts a plan to free her. Marga confides her secrets to Isidro.
episodes.title: Chapter 38: Power

episodes.synopsis: Lidia is desperate to save her imprisoned friend. Elisa discloses Carlos' fate. Marga realizes who betrayed her. Carmen targets Lidia's loved ones.
episodes.title: Chapter 39: Patience

episodes.synopsis: Elisa reveals a startling secret as more of Lidia's friends are endangered. Sofía turns to an old friend for help protecting the prisoners from Carmen.
episodes.title: Chapter 40: Pain

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected ally seeking the ultimate revenge helps Lidia try and enact her plan to free all the  prisoners from the women's prison camp.
episodes.title: Chapter 41: Defeat

episodes.synopsis: When the final phase of their escape plan is threatened, Lidia, Carlota, Marga and Óscar make a momentous decision together.
episodes.title: Chapter 42: The End
